title: Why did Kendrick Lamar get a Nobel Prize? - Quora

response.answer_text: Kendrick Lamar has never won a Nobel Prize. He has however won a Pulitzer Prize in music for his 2017 album DAMN. The Pulitzer board wrote “A virtuosic song collection unified by its vernacular authenticity and rhythmic dynamism that offers affecting vignettes capturing the complexity of modern African-American life.” Kendrick Lamar's 'DAMN.' Wins Historic Pulitzer Prize In Music There numerous articles about this given his genre is Hip-Hop which had never been rewarded in their way before. Previous winners were classical or jazz.

In the real world, he hasn’t. But, since you’ve written the question as if he has, I can only assume that you’re coming up with a fictional scenario in which he did. In that case, you’d want to look into the criteria for the awards and have him doing something which would merit one or another.
